channel.title: VS 2005 Web Application Project V1.0 Released
channel.description: OK, so the odds that you read my blog and not Scott Guthrie’s are pretty low, especially if you have any interest in this topic.  However, Scott just announced that the VS 2005 Web Application Project has gone V1.0.  I...
